author: angela
msg: - LazyItemIterator: fixing wrong usage in ItemManagerImpl
- TransientItemStateFactory: slightly modify methods, adding additional
parameters that are already known upon creation of the states and must
not be changed later on (-> removing setters on NodeState/PropertyState)
> adjust parameters according to modifications in TransientISF
> remove 'getDefinition(NodeTypeRegistry). since definition is set upon
creation, there is no need for this fallback method.
> remove 'getDefinition(NodeTypeRegistry). since definition is set upon
creation, there is no need for this fallback method.
- SetPropertyValue: 'isMultiValued()' is redundant. removed and replaced

author: danj
msg: Fix for MUSE-58 - contribution from Joel H., I just moved the code to take WsResource[] and turn it into
an Element[] (relationship XML) into QueryRelationshipsResponse rather than the handler. This keeps the
parsing/definition of the message format consistent with other operations.
I also updated SimpleRelationships.create*() so that the relationship resources are initialized after
creation, and a RelationshipCreationFailedFault is consistently thrown for the two points of failure.

author: asmuts
msg: Adding file size verifying unit tests.
Improved optimization unit test to verify the exact expected file size.

author: andreas
msg: Don't use non-existing nodes in TreeSiteManager.getAvailableLocator()
